adapter - package adapter
 
add(Comment) - Method in class model.CommentList
Add a Comment object to the CommentList, if a Comment with a same id already exists, then the old one will be removed before the new one been added.
add(String) - Method in class model.IdSet
Add an Comment id to this IdSet
addAll(Collection<String>) - Method in class model.IdSet
Add a set of Comment id to this IdSet.
addCache(String, String, CacheController, String, Activity) - Method in class network_io.IoStreamHandler
Load a Comment and all it's replies for cache ,store it in the shared preferences depends on tag.
addCacheAsReply(Activity, String, Comment) - Method in class cache.CacheController
Add a Comment to shared preferences as either favorite or indicated Comment's reply Comment.
addCacheAsTopLevel(Activity, Comment, String) - Method in class cache.CacheController
Add a Comment to shared preferences as either favorite or indicated Comment(the key of shared preferences is indicated by tag).
addComment(Comment) - Method in class model.CommentMap
Add a Comment object in the CommentMap with its own id, if Comment with the same ID exists,do nothing, notify the ArrayAdapter the data set has changed after update if the ArrayAdapter has been set.
addOrUpdateComment(Comment) - Method in class network_io.IoStreamHandler
Update a Comment with its own id to the web server, if the Comment with the same id doesn't exist, then this Comment will be added to the server.
addReply(Comment) - Method in class model.Comment
Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
addReply(String) - Method in class model.Comment
Add the comment id of a reply Comment object to the reply id set.
all_topic_spinner - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.id
 
AllTopicPageActivity - Class in activity
An activity which will Load and show all top-level comments to the user from the Internet(with 5 different sorting options),it also allow user to publish a new top level comment, view a comment, and provide the access to the local comment which stored as favorites or indicated comment and logout option.
AllTopicPageActivity() - Constructor for class activity.AllTopicPageActivity
 
android - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.drawable
 
app_name - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
AppBaseTheme - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.style
Base application theme, dependent on API level.
applications_internet - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.drawable
 
AppTheme - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.style
Application theme.
attached_pic_dis - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
attachpicture - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
 
authorinfo - Static variable in class com.example.projectapp.R.string
